mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message(chat_message_id, chat_message_emp_no, chat_message_content, chat_message_type, chat_message_is_delete) VALUES (#{room}, #{sender}, #{message}, #{type}, false)
mapper.select: SELECT cr.chat_room_idx AS roomIdx, cr.chat_room_name AS roomName, cr.chat_room_last_message AS roomLastMessage, cr.chat_room_last_message_send_date AS roomLastMessageDate, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_room_member crm WHERE crm.chat_room_member_id = cr.chat_room_idx AND crm.chat_room_member_is_join = 1) AS roomMemberCount FROM chat_room cr INNER JOIN chat_room_member crm ON cr.chat_room_idx = crm.chat_room_member_id WHERE crm.chat_room_member_emp_no = #{param1} AND crm.chat_room_member_is_join = 1 AND cr.chat_room_is_active = true ORDER BY cr.chat_room_last_message_send_date DESC

SELECT e.emp_no AS emp_no, e.emp_name AS emp_name, p.profile_new AS profile_new FROM employee e INNER JOIN chat_room_member crm ON e.emp_no = crm.chat_room_member_emp_no LEFT JOIN profile_photo p ON p.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE crm.chat_room_member_id = #{roomIdx} AND crm.chat_room_member_is_join = 1

SELECT chat_message_idx AS chatId, chat_message_emp_no AS sender, chat_message_content AS message, chat_message_send_date AS date, chat_message_type AS type, chat_message_is_delete AS messageIsDelete FROM chat_message cm WHERE chat_message_id = #{param1}

SELECT chat_attachment_type AS fileType, chat_attachment_name AS fileName, chat_attachment_ori_name AS oriFileName from chat_attachment ca INNER JOIN chat_message cm ON cm.chat_message_idx = ca.chat_attachment_message_id WHERE chat_message_idx = #{chatId}
